title: ** AWESOME T210 Oddity ** Series 8 Pepe w/ Upside-down Series 3 back ** SOLD! **
author: shammus

posts.post_title: ** AWESOME T210 Oddity ** Series 8 Pepe w/ Upside-down Series 3 back ** SOLD! **
posts.post_content:
Amazing card, which is significant as it gives a pretty strong indication that multiple t210 series were produced at the same time and at the same location / facility!

One nice little perk of buying this card is that SGC is even acknowledging this mishap on the slab!

Asking $795 delivered.  Thanks in advance!

Brian
